body:
Hello Avicus!

Long story short I would like the creation of a basic nebula shop to put on certain maps. These maps will be mostly Throwback maps but I would it would be easier for those to add a nebula shop into their maps if they wish for it. 

Your job is simple. Tell me what was in the nebula shop and certain details about them. What level did people get certain items at? What did items do? Any information that will be useful to get as close as we can to the old Nebula Shop. Thank you very much for any help that is provided.
body_tagged:

title: Help Me Make a Nebula Shop

replies.body:
Spanky Spade
-Diamond shovel
-Knock Back II
-10 kills in one life? I think?

Golden Apple
-Can buy one for ? or 5 for ?

Arrows
-Kind of obsolete but they were there

-Knock Back II
-10 kills in one life? I think?

replies.body: Besides the ones mentioned already, there was also a fire aspect torch, and some potions that would be given to the whole team.
replies.body_tagged: Besides the ones mentioned already, there was also a fire aspect torch, and some potions that would be given to the whole team.

replies.body:
Please add the following items, they are probably the most important ones:

Golden Apples
Steaks
Wood
Glass
Spanky Spade (Knockback II diamond shovel)

replies.body: I remember there being a speed pot and a instant health drink pot

You forgot the most important thing to add:


Players

replies.body: Advertise the server and get some players, then we will talk about helping you with a Nebula Shop.

replies.body:
You were able for like 20 points or whatever currency you wanted could buy the whole team a golden apple, something like that.

Egg Grenades 
TNT, Auto Ignite
